title: The Billionaire's Submission
description: Mia's sexual awakening has made her sexually aggressive. But when Garret doesn't want to play by the rules, Mia begins to have second thoughts about his marriage proposal. Will things fall into place as Mia tries to school Garret in the art of BDSM, or will it destroy their relationship completely?This book is intended for mature audiences only and contains explicit sexual acts.Estimated Length: 8,700 wordsThis is the third and final book in The Billionaire's Trilogy.
author: K. Matthew
